title: Dear Anonymous Sponsor
summary:
"Miss Judith, how about spending this summer at the Curtis estate in Wilz?"  
After five years of silence, her anonymous benefactor finally replied—with an invitation to meet.  
Judith, a war orphan and secret esper, had fled to the Federation after her homeland’s defeat. In her painful life, the only warmth came from a mysterious benefactor.  
She never knew their name or face, but their generous gifts filled the void in her heart. Though she never received a reply, writing a monthly letter of gratitude became her cherished routine. So when the invitation arrived, she eagerly set off for Wilz.  
There, in the dazzling and dangerous city, she met three men: a charming rogue with an enigmatic smile, a successful businessman who cared for her, and a gang leader who clashed with her at every turn.  
One of them was her benefactor—but who?

title: Seeking For Your Forgiveness
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Limited Extra Time
summary:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)

**Official English Translation of the Novel:** [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/29265), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/karinas-last-days-novel/info)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EC%97%91%EC%8A%A4%ED%8A%B8%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%8B%9C%EA%B0%84/2746), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58261408)

title: BJ Villainess
summary: A game developer suddenly wakes up as the villainess [Tereze] in her own reverse-harem game — now turned into a deadly cosmic broadcast. To survive, she must achieve the "True Ending" by winning over one of four male leads, despite her character being designed for tragic deaths.---TL Note: "BJ" is a Korean slang that means streamer. It stands for Bang-Jang (방장).

title: Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?
summary:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)

title: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: Genius Martial Arts Trainer
summary:
Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. 

Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. 

As Jun Lee’s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...

title: Transcension Academy
summary:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.

title: The Housekeeper in the Dungeon
summary: No summary available.

title: Deadlines are Raining in the Status Window
summary: A masterpiece of over 3,000 volumes, I was incarnated into “Dawn of Repentance.” Moreover, as the successor to the duke’s family, facing a grim fate, I became my cherished character, “Mitchell Nephtis.” But upon opening the status window, the countdown to death was D-3. With the thought that I couldn’t die like this, I somehow managed to survive, and each time I changed the development, experience points were granted?! If that’s the case, I’ll change the original storyline drastically to reap the benefits. Leaving the deceased “Michell Nephtys” aside, I lived as the nanny’s daughter, “Evan Laeff,” doing as told, but missions kept pouring in on the status window, and failure meant death. Now that it’s like this, whether the storyline changes or not doesn’t matter. I will definitely survive and prevail

title: Food Chain
summary:
I, Go Eun-woo, have lived while hiding my status among humans. I used my abilities to reduce the pain of scarlet fever, the fate of the Tiger tribe, which I have suffered from since I was 18, but was discovered by the Tiger's natural enemy, Imae.
“Don’t be so foolish. If you run away, you’ll die by my hands in a month or so.”
Moreover, this cold and frighteningly handsome Lee Mae,
I can’t believe I have the same seal as Lee Do-hoon. I bought time by lying, but it's only a matter of time before I get caught. I have to escape from his grasp somehow... !
“Please stay in my room with me for the time being.”
Can I go back to my normal daily life?!

title: How to Perfectly End a Contract Marriage
summary:
To bring her beloved back, she turned back time, becoming terminally ill with only a year to live. She tried reuniting him with his past love but failed.

“Marry me for just one year.” Why is he proposing this?  “I will only have one wife. You’ll be my first and last, Charlotte.”

title: Emperor of Solo Play
summary:
Betrayed by his guild and defeated by a top player, Hyrkan loses everything. Before he can get revenge, a fatal accident ends his life — only for him to wake up years in the past, back at the start of Warlord. 

Now, with his memories intact, he’s determined to rise to the top alone. But in a game where power means everything, can he truly survive without any allies? 

The Emperor of Solo Play is back, and this time, he’s playing by his own rules.

title: Killer Peter
summary:
After devoting his life to the crime organization, Glory Club, Peter retires his status as a legendary killer and spends his remaining days running a quiet used bookstore.

But after being ambushed and nearly killed one day by the very organization he dedicated his life to, Peter finds his body magically reverted back to its teenage years!

Now that Peter is back to his peak physique, he sets out to settle the score with Glory Club!

---

**Official Translations**
[Chinese (Simplified)](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/shashoubadeluo/list?title_no=2697)
[Chinese (Traditional)](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=6015)
[French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=6155)
[German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=6193)
[Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=5846)
[Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=5899)

title: Regressor of the Fallen family
summary:
Logan McLain, a middle-aged knight fighting for the independence army, is intent on getting revenge against the empire which took over the kingdom and executed his brother when he ends up dying in battle. But when he wakes, he is a young man again, and has yet to be disowned for his terrible behavior. 

Using his experience and knowledge from his past life, Logan recruits a few talented individuals to develop new weapons, build an army, and make enough money to fund it all. 

But will he be able to make amends with his family and stop the empire's march?

title: Academy’s Undercover Professor
summary:
Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. 

The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. 

The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.

title: My Daddy Hides His Power
summary:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isn’t just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my ‘Random Imperial Citizen #1’ life...

Living in a world of constant war—365 days of chaos—a simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

“Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!”
“...”
“This man screams ‘background character,’ living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?”

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my father’s worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

“...Dad?”

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyes—practically shouting “I’m the protagonist!”

“WHAT?!”

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dad—no, this mysterious powerhouse—gripped his weapon and snarled:
“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”

title: Monday to Weekend
summary:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

title: Auto-Hunting With Clones
summary:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title: Path of the Shaman
summary:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title: A Fortune-Telling Princess
summary:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: The Business Is Closed Due To The Tyrant Parents
The Last Adventurer
summary:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

title: Mr. War: The Ultimate Ex-Soldier
summary:
George, a legendary special forces soldier feared by both allies and enemies, earned the nickname “Mr. War” for his unmatched combat prowess.
But betrayed by his own comrades, he met his end on the battlefield in a deadly conspiracy.

Presumed dead, he suddenly awakens in a filthy slum known as Industrial Waste Island… a lawless zone ruled by violence and exploitation.

Reborn as Michio, a powerless slave laborer, he finds himself at the bottom of society.
But with his brilliant mind and lethal skills, Mr. War is ready to climb back to the top… and make his enemies pay.

title: The Female Lead’s Mother and the Male Lead’s Father Are Married
Honey, I Think That’s a Misunderstanding
summary: A noblewoman preparing for a political marriage keeps fainting in terror whenever she meets her intimidating fiancé—but he mistakes her fear for affection. Determined to call off the engagement, she must navigate his unexpected romanticism and family secrets.

title: I Will Buy Divine Power With Money!
Charlotte’s Wheel
summary: Vivienne, a wicked woman called the Witch of Goseong. She committed all kinds of evil and was eventually killed by the revolutionary army. The twilight witch who appeared in front of her just before her death leaves meaningful words and brings Vivian back to three years ago. Vivian stands up to seize power after vowing not to lose her loved ones again.

title: I Want To Be Fooled
summary:
“*My seatmate, Shiraishi-san, is just too cute—and it's driving me crazy!*”

They know each other, but they’re not exactly friends. Akaogi Ayame and Shiraishi Konomi are classmates—*nothing more, nothing less.* Ayame is strikingly beautiful, a standout athlete, and popular in class, whilst Konomi is shy, introverted, and has only one friend. They should’ve had no reason to interact... so how did things end up this way? What started as a small, trivial incident caused Ayame’s hidden feelings to overflow, now she can’t stop thinking about *her!*

title: The adopted daughter-in-law wants to leave
summary:
I possessed the body of the no. 1 villainess, Ellie, who was a terrible person who tormented the Male Lead in the orphanage. I quietly waited until the day that the Duke would pick him up vowed to never get caught up in the novel, so she would not see the ugly ending that the villainess did, until...

"I will also adopt the child next to him too... she will become my daughter-in-law."

I was adopted along with the Male Lead! I can’t just do this? There’s a separate heroine!

---
I have possessed the extremely cruel villainess who tormented the male lead during his childhood days in the orphanage.

To change my fate, I decided “Just don’t do that,” but the pitiful boy kept getting beaten up by the other kids anyway, so I had to keep an eye on him even more!

Then one day, his father's best friend the Duke, who had been searching for the male lead for 10 years, finally found the orphanage. 

“I'll adopt this child here. Oh, and the child next to him too.”

Wait, why am I also getting adopted?!

He wants me as his daughter-in-law for the male lead?!? 

What about the female lead??

—

Just like in the original novel, the male lead joined his adoptive father in the war. 

He was supposed to return from the battlefield with the female lead, so I carefully prepared for a divorce and made a lot of money so I can live by myself! But…

“Damian, did you come home alone? Did no one else come with you?”

“Someone else?” Upon hearing my question, Damian’s gaze suddenly sharpened.

“Ellie. are you looking for a man other than your husband?” 

“Huh?”

“That's no good, I would probably kill that man out of jealousy.”

I looked over to my father-in-law for help.

“I also agree, Ellie. You shouldn’t betray your husband ever...”

title: Tamed the Monster Prince
summary: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. Yet, after dying,  Marie finds herself back a year in the past, discovering that no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

title: Mercenary Enrollment
summary:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: The Fox-Eyed Villain of the Demon Academy
summary:
The very last moment before the novel was about the end, the strongest villain met a pitiful fate.

But that wasn't the end.

"So, this is how I die."

I, who was once the author, woke up as the fox-eyed villian who was never once understood.

A fallen family. A life thrown away for revenge. A future sealed in tragedy.

I'm going to rewrite it all.

This villain's end... will be reversed.

title: The Veteran Healer Is Overpowered
summary: Top Korean hunter Siu 'The Rabid Hound' Min defeated the Demon Lord with his disciples, only to be trapped in a monster-filled otherworld for 100 years. However, a century of struggles did not break Siu—it drove him to break his limits instead. Now, he returns to Earth with Pred, his mysterious partner, only to learn that his name and legacy have been erased, along with his disciples’... and that only 10 years have passed on Earth. As new conflicts arise, will Siu and Pred prevail and uncover the truth?

title: The Cursed Prince and His Clairvoyant Maid
Surviving with an SSS-Rank Inventory
summary: Sora was summoned to another world as a hero. While other heroes were bestowed with powerful combat skills, Sora’s skill was something ordinary: Alchemy. Ridiculed for having a useless skill, he was exiled to the Demon Forest. However, little did they know, his skill was actually an exceptional SSS-Rank skill!

title: Player Elimination Plan! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
summary: The apocalypse prophecy has come true. A dark celestial body draws near, turning the entire Blue Star into a doomsday game. All of humanity has been reduced to NPCs—helpless prey for players from beyond the stars. As the world mutates and players run rampant, despair consumes mankind… Until Yun Qi awakens a hidden class, gaining the power to strike back against the players.

title: Monster Princess
summary: An old school yakuza, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But, when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before, he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!

title: You Can Hear It
summary: Ryouran High School is a private arts academy where geniuses in every field—music, dance, fashion—gather. But in reality, looks decide the students' success, not talent. My sister, Shiika Ikebukuro, is a shut-in who can't do anything without her older brother, and I was sure that devastating lack of charisma would doom her. But I know a secret. Though you'd never guess it, behind her mask, the internet sensation VSINGER is none other than my sister, Shiika! Her voice is one of a kind, but will it be enough to overcome Ryouran High's entire social order?

title: Magic Academy’s Genius Blinker
summary:
A character with extreme difficulty and the worst performance, Baek Yu-Seol was considered tr*sh in the game because he couldn’t use magic in a fantasy world where everyone else could.

However…

[Due to the wrong ending, 90% of Aether World has been destroyed.] [Please reach the ‘True Ending.’]
Suddenly, those words echoed in my mind before I was transmigrated to the Aether World.

[You can use the skill ‘Flash’.]
“Why did I possess this character?”

Flash was the only magic skill I was given.

Surviving in Stella Academy where many genius mages ran rampant, I became the notorious Flash Mage.

title: My Contract Husband Resembles the Male Protagonist
summary:
Enya Lockhart remembers that she reincarnated into a terrible novel she once read, nicknamed Empress Impisonment. Knowing that she's fated to marry the emperor, a terrible person, she aims to avoid marriage to save her life.

She enters into a one-year contract marriage to a mercenary named Dale, in order to break off an engagement with the emperor.

Unlike the original emperor in the novel, Dale is pure, innocent, and kind.

One day, she found herself thinking...

"If I were to truly marry, it should be someone like him."

And then — something happened.

title: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage
summary: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand life’s burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!

title: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated
summary: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

title: Academy’s Genius Swordmaster
summary:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title: Limitless Ascension: Strength Amid Adversity
summary: With a system that grows stronger against it’s enemies, Ye Jun Ling who almost passed away from old age began his cheating life of cultivating with no upper limits. Divine emperor? Saint? The heavenly principles? Stand aside! Other than that, he also had several disciples. The senior disciple is a demonic sect master, with vicious heart and treacherous mind, but got easily taken care of everytime! The second disciple is a white hair loli, with the number one divine constitution, likes to cook despite being super strong, and serve her master…

title: A Savage Proposal
summary: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
